notebooks.title: Harmonic Oscillator
notebooks.description: Simulation of a damped harmonic oscillator, modeling a spring-mass-damper system.

notebooks.title: Linear Feedback System
notebooks.description: Simulation of a simple linear feedback system with step response.

notebooks.title: Pendulum
notebooks.description: Simulation of a nonlinear mathematical pendulum.

notebooks.title: Van der Pol
notebooks.description: Simulation of the Van der Pol oscillator, a classic example of a stiff dynamical system.

notebooks.title: Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates an anti-lock braking system (ABS) using nonlinear tire dynamics and event-driven slip control. The system prevents wheel lockup during braking by modulating brake torque t...

notebooks.title: Cascade Controller
notebooks.description: Demonstration of a two-loop cascade PID control system with inner and outer loops.

notebooks.title: DC Motor Speed Control
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates multi-domain modeling of a DC motor with PID speed control. The system combines electrical and mechanical dynamics with anti-windup control to handle voltage saturation.

notebooks.title: Kalman Filter
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates the Kalman filter in PathSim for optimal state estimation of a linear dynamical system from noisy measurements. The filter recursively estimates the state of a moving obje...

notebooks.title: PID Controller
notebooks.description: Simulation of a PID controller tracking a step-changing setpoint.

notebooks.title: Thermostat
notebooks.description: Simulation of a thermostat with threshold-based switching between heater states.

notebooks.title: Billards & Collisions
notebooks.description: Simulation of a ball bouncing inside a circular boundary using event detection.

notebooks.title: Bouncing Ball
notebooks.description: Simulation of a bouncing ball using PathSim's event handling system.

notebooks.title: Bouncing Pendulum
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates a hybrid system combining continuous pendulum dynamics with discrete bounce events. The pendulum swings until it hits the ground (zero angle), at which point it bounces ba...

notebooks.title: Coupled Oscillators
notebooks.description: Simulation of two coupled damped harmonic oscillators using ODE blocks.

notebooks.title: Elastic Pendulum
notebooks.description: Simulation of an elastic pendulum combining spring and pendulum dynamics.

notebooks.title: Stick Slip
notebooks.description: Simulation of a mechanical system exhibiting stick-slip behavior due to Coulomb friction.

notebooks.title: Switched Bouncing Ball
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates advanced event handling with multiple simultaneous events, event switching, and conditional event logic. The bouncing ball bounces on a table first, and then drops to the ...

notebooks.title: Delta-Sigma ADC
notebooks.description: Simulation of a first-order delta-sigma analog-to-digital converter.

notebooks.title: Diode Circuit
notebooks.description: Simulation of a diode circuit demonstrating nonlinear algebraic loop solving.

notebooks.title: Noisy Amplifier
notebooks.description: Simulation of a nonlinear, noisy, and band-limited amplifier model.

notebooks.title: SAR ADC
notebooks.description: Simulation of a Successive Approximation Register ADC with custom block creation.

notebooks.title: FMCW Radar
notebooks.description: In this example we simulate a simple frequency modulated continuous wave (FMCW) radar system.

notebooks.title: RF Network - One Port
notebooks.description: Simulation of a Radio Frequency (RF) network using scikit-rf for state-space conversion.

notebooks.title: Spectrum Analysis
notebooks.description: In this example we demonstrate frequency domain analysis using PathSim's spectrum block. We'll examine the frequency response of a Butterworth lowpass filter by analyzing its response to a Gaussian...

notebooks.title: Transfer Function
notebooks.description: In this example we demonstrate how to use transfer functions in PathSim using the Pole-Residue-Constant (PRC) form. This representation is particularly convenient for transfer functions with comple...

notebooks.title: Chemical Reactor
notebooks.description: Simulation of a continuous stirred tank reactor (CSTR) with consecutive exothermic reactions.

notebooks.title: Algebraic Loop
notebooks.description: Demonstration of PathSim's automatic handling of algebraic loops.

notebooks.title: Lorenz Attractor
notebooks.description: Simulation of the famous Lorenz attractor, a chaotic dynamical system.

notebooks.title: Nested Subsystems
notebooks.description: Demonstration of hierarchical modeling using nested subsystems for a Van der Pol oscillator.

notebooks.title: Poincaré Maps
notebooks.description: Demonstration of computing Poincaré sections for chaotic dynamical systems using event handling.

notebooks.title: FMU Co-Simulation
notebooks.description: Demonstration of integrating Functional Mock-up Units (FMU) as PathSim blocks.

notebooks.title: FMU ME: Bouncing Ball
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates Model Exchange FMU integration with PathSim. Unlike co-simulation FMUs, Model Exchange FMUs provide only the differential equations. PathSim's solvers perform the numerica...

notebooks.title: FMU ME: Van der Pol
notebooks.description: This example demonstrates Model Exchange FMU integration with a nonlinear oscillator. The Van der Pol equation exhibits self-sustained oscillations:
